alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 1:50PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Water levels reach low steel on bottom of Co. Hwy 25 bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 PM CDT Tuesday was 28.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.0 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
